verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came again unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> and say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Howl <WH3213> <WH8685> ye, Woe worth <WH1929> the day <WH3117> !
For the day <WH3117> is near <WH7138>, even the day <WH3117> of the YY <WH3068> is near <WH7138>, a cloudy <WH6051> day <WH3117>; it shall be the time <WH6256> of the heathen <WH1471>.

And the sword <WH2719> shall come <WH935> <WH8804> upon Egypt <WH4714>, and great pain <WH2479> shall be in Ethiopia <WH3568>, when the slain <WH2491> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8800> in Egypt <WH4714>, and they shall take away <WH3947> <WH8804> her multitude <WH1995>, and her foundations <WH3247> shall be broken down <WH2040> <WH8738>.

Ethiopia <WH3568>, and Libya <WH6316>, and Lydia <WH3865>, and all the mingled <WH6153> people, and Chub <WH3552>, and the men <WH1121> of the land <WH776> that is in league <WH1285>, shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> with them by the sword <WH2719>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; They also that uphold <WH5564> <WH8802> Egypt <WH4714> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8804>; and the pride <WH1347> of her power <WH5797> shall come down <WH3381> <WH8804>: from the tower <WH4024> of Syene <WH5482> shall they fall <WH5307> <WH8799> in it by the sword <WH2719>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

And they shall be desolate <WH8074> <WH8738> in the midst <WH8432> of the countries <WH776> that are desolate <WH8074> <WH8737>, and her cities <WH5892> shall be in the midst <WH8432> of the cities <WH5892> that are wasted <WH2717> <WH8737>.

And they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, when I have set <WH5414> <WH8800> a fire <WH784> in Egypt <WH4714>, and when all her helpers <WH5826> <WH8802> shall be destroyed <WH7665> <WH8738>.

In that day <WH3117> shall messengers <WH4397> go forth <WH3318> <WH8799> from me <WH6440> in ships <WH6716> to make the careless <WH983> Ethiopians <WH3568> afraid <WH2729> <WH8687>, and great pain <WH2479> shall come upon them, as in the day <WH3117> of Egypt <WH4714>: for, lo, it cometh <WH935> <WH8802>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will also make the multitude <WH1995> of Egypt <WH4714> to cease <WH7673> <WH8689> by the hand <WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>.

He and his people <WH5971> with him, the terrible <WH6184> of the nations <WH1471>, shall be brought <WH935> <WH8716> to destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> the land <WH776>: and they shall draw <WH7324> <WH8689> their swords <WH2719> against Egypt <WH4714>, and fill <WH4390> <WH8804> the land <WH776> with the slain <WH2491>.

And I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> the rivers <WH2975> dry <WH2724>, and sell <WH4376> <WH8804> the land <WH776> into the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7451>: and I will make the land <WH776> waste <WH8074> <WH8689>, and all that is therein <WH4393>, by the hand <WH3027> of strangers <WH2114> <WH8801>: I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will also destroy <WH6> <WH8689> the idols <WH1544>, and I will cause their images <WH457> to cease <WH7673> <WH8689> out of Noph <WH5297>; and there shall be no more a prince <WH5387> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: and I will put <WH5414> <WH8804> a fear <WH3374> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And I will make Pathros <WH6624> desolate <WH8074> <WH8689>, and will set <WH5414> <WH8804> fire <WH784> in Zoan <WH6814>, and will execute <WH6213> <WH8804> judgments <WH8201> in No <WH4996>.
And I will pour <WH8210> <WH8804> my fury <WH2534> upon Sin <WH5512>, the strength <WH4581> of Egypt <WH4714>; and I will cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> the multitude <WH1995> of No <WH4996>.

And I will set <WH5414> <WH8804> fire <WH784> in Egypt <WH4714>: Sin <WH5512> shall have great <WH2342> <WH8800> pain <WH2342> <WH8799>, and No <WH4996> shall be rent asunder <WH1234> <WH8736>, and Noph <WH5297> shall have distresses <WH6862> daily <WH3119>.
The young men <WH970> of Aven <WH206> and of Pibeseht <WH6364> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by the sword <WH2719>: and these cities shall go <WH3212> <WH8799> into captivity <WH7628>.

At Tehaphnehes <WH8471> also the day <WH3117> shall be darkened <WH2821> <WH8804> <WH8676> <WH2820> <WH8804>, when I shall break <WH7665> <WH8800> there the yokes <WH4133> of Egypt <WH4714>: and the pomp <WH1347> of her strength <WH5797> shall cease <WH7673> <WH8738> in her <WH1931>: as for her, a cloud <WH6051> shall cover <WH3680> <WH8762> her, and her daughters <WH1323> shall go <WH3212> <WH8799> into captivity <WH7628>.
Thus will I execute <WH6213> <WH8804> judgments <WH8201> in Egypt <WH4714>: and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

And it came to pass in the eleventh <WH259> <WH6240> year <WH8141>, in the first <WH7223> month, in the seventh <WH7651> day of the month <WH2320>, that the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, I have broken <WH7665> <WH8804> the arm <WH2220> of Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>; and, lo, it shall not be bound up <WH2280> <WH8795> to be healed <WH7499> <WH5414> <WH8800>, to put <WH7760> <WH8800> a roller <WH2848> to bind <WH2280> <WH8800> it, to make it strong <WH2388> <WH8800> to hold <WH8610> <WH8800> the sword <WH2719>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I am against Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and will break <WH7665> <WH8804> his arms <WH2220>, the strong <WH2389>, and that which was broken <WH7665> <WH8737>; and I will cause the sword <WH2719> to fall <WH5307> <WH8689> out of his hand <WH3027>.
And I will scatter <WH6327> <WH8689> the Egyptians <WH4714> among the nations <WH1471>, and will disperse <WH2219> <WH8765> them through the countries <WH776>.

And I will strengthen <WH2388> <WH8765> the arms <WH2220> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> my sword <WH2719> in his hand <WH3027>: but I will break <WH7665> <WH8804> Pharaoh's <WH6547> arms <WH2220>, and he shall groan <WH5008> <WH8804> before <WH6440> him with the groanings <WH5009> of a deadly wounded <WH2491> man.

But I will strengthen <WH2388> <WH8689> the arms <WH2220> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and the arms <WH2220> of Pharaoh <WH6547> shall fall down <WH5307> <WH8799>; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, when I shall put <WH5414> <WH8800> my sword <WH2719> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall stretch it out <WH5186> <WH8804> upon the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And I will scatter <WH6327> <WH8689> the Egyptians <WH4714> among the nations <WH1471>, and disperse <WH2219> <WH8765> them among the countries <WH776>; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
